prompts.frontCover: Greeting card front cover, minimalist flat 2D vector illustration of Grandpa and Tong Tong from the reference photos, reimagined in a heartfelt and artistic scene. The setting is a serene, calm sea under a soft, creamy sky. In the middle of the frame, Grandpa and Tong Tong are shown from the waist up, seated together in a simple, elegant wooden fishing boat (sampan). Grandpa has his arm gently around Tong Tong's shoulder, and they are both looking forward with warm, happy expressions. Tong Tong is holding a small, stylized Chinese opera mask. Floating gently in the water around the boat are delicate, minimalist illustrations of a crab and a shrimp, representing a love for seafood. The entire composition has a clean, simple, and elegant feel with a warm color palette of soft blues, creams, muted reds, and gentle wood tones. Centered below the boat, in a beautiful, readable handwritten cursive script, the text reads "Happy Birthday Grandpa". The overall feeling is tender, peaceful, and deeply personal.
